website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Reflect Contour 2 headphones deliver balanced Bluetooth audio in an exercise-focused design.
pros: Balanced audio performance with solid bass depth and crisp highs
cons: In-ear fit can have a tremendous effect on audio performance

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: 1st 3 months, the product worked very well and was very happy with it, but I’m glad I waited to write my review because all of a sudden they just stopped working. I tried to charge them, and nothing happened. If they stopped working because of sweat, that is not acceptable because they are supposed to be sweat proof. I do sweat a lot too. That’s why I bought them. JBL is also supposed to be a great company with great products, WELL THESE ARE GARBAGE! I wish I could get my money back. Let me repeat, the only worked for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: I returned them. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I returned them when they suddenly stopped working after only a few uses. I'm 38. I run about 3 to 4 miles a day. They're advertised as sport headphones. I was gentle with them, didnt mistreat them. Kept them clean and in their case when not in use. I returned them. If $100 headphones advertised as sports headphones can't handle my workouts, then they aren't sports headphones. Period. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JAFox

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great package. Fairly good design. Sound quality is so so. Turns on but can’t find any device. Purchased near end of June and not to long after the 30 day warranty it failed. Now they are junk!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Smarjesse

customer_reviews.title: In general, under-performing headphones..
customer_reviews.text: Under-performing headphones. In-ear fit is good, but they lock up often which then requires a full recharge to correct. Inconvenient, to say the least! Sound is mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: Quantz

customer_reviews.title: Good for a workout
customer_reviews.text: These are great for working out. They stay in place and sweat doesn’t seem to be a problem. They just aren’t very loud. I was expecting more.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Mysteriously quit powering on
customer_reviews.text: Sound great. Loved them for the 3 months they powered on. I used them for higher intensity workouts and rotated them with my beats over ear headphones. Won’t power on now - extremely frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Zdarko

customer_reviews.title: Owned 2 pairs and love them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband to replace his other JBL's he lost and he loves these! Battery life and sound quality is excellent. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ENS

customer_reviews.title: Very bad sound
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a tin can, I've returned it and will buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: M Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, not sweatproof at all. Won’t turn on sometimes even though it’s been charging all night. Returned them once within a month of ownership with no issues because they come with a year warranty. Then the new pair started doing the same thing within 6 months and Amazon wouldn’t accept another return. Will never buy another pair of JBL headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Boruch

customer_reviews.title: JBL is my new go to
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good. Bass can get distorted, but for the price I can't complain. Very comfortable and the cord doesn't get in the way, which I was worried about. It handles the sweat without a problem during long workouts. Battery life is good, lasts 6 hours at just below full volume.
customer_reviews.author: Nick U.

customer_reviews.text: Sound drops often while moving or around heavy wireless traffic. However the bulid and fast charging keep them in my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Really really good
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had more bass. And volume. These are two impossibilities for earbuds. They are very comfortable, paired effortlessly, and never fall out of my ears. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A. Rose MD

customer_reviews.title: great workout headphones
customer_reviews.text: these headphones are great for working out and the batter lasts for days if you turn them off when you’re not using them!
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Buttons stopped working after two weeks. Would turn off on its own and randomly pair. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Loved the JBL wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I have an older pair of wireless ear buds from JBL and loved them. It was with this trust that I decided to stay with this company. The new raised controls was definitely an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: norman yaffe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brand but not this model
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life and build, also fits perfectly but sound quality I would give it 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Technology lover

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. The color pops and they look great. The sound is great, and they don’t fall off my ears. I’ve done several workouts with them and have had no compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Erin McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Quit Working
customer_reviews.text: This pair of headphones lasted me about a month - then they just suddenly shut off and will not charge or turn on. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schertz

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: The on/off switch broke- couldn’t turn the buds off. This happened after having them just a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lise Dambrot

customer_reviews.title: Randomly Breaks
customer_reviews.text: The headphones randomly won't turn on or off, won't charge completely, etc..
customer_reviews.author: erin allare

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what I ordered but had to have a pair for work these are 60$ trash
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: JBL - Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily when working out - easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best! I don't loose it from my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Karlos

customer_reviews.title: TOP NOTCH
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review consumer items. Seems to me they should be good, period. This is an exception. I've long struggled to find a pair of good sports headphones that match stability with good price and high quality sound. A recent pair of Sonys were a complete disaster, the controls collapsing in humid weather. The JBL Reflect Contour 2 on the other hand ticks all the boxes. They stay perfectly fixed in the ear without any interference with other clothing, provide a perfectly clear sound, and the controls all do what they're meant to do. I would appreciate more bass, but it seems that's just about impossible with in-ear phones. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: A reader and traveler

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise they are great. I use them to listen to talk radio ...
customer_reviews.text: You pay a price for having earbuds that hang on and won't fall off. They take time to put on properly. The bass is non-existent. Otherwise they are great. I use them to listen to talk radio and not music. So if you are a music fan, then find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones if you hate bass
customer_reviews.text: I like these, comfortable, nice button functions. But you can't hear the bass in metal or rock or pop or any other music. I like a balanced sound and these weren't even close tp balanced. The treble and mids were very clear and good quality. Idk who listens to bassless music but if you do these headphones are for you. I returned them and got bose sport buds and I'm blown away the the wonderful sound of those.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not complete garbage, but pretty close
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a $25 pair of no-name brand earbuds for 3-4 years so I thought it was time for a new set. I tried these because JBL supposedly has a good brand name. These are just not good ear buds. I'm no audiophile but these have terrible sound. They don't get very loud at all. If max volume on my old pair is 10 then the JBL gets to 6, maybe 7. I expected WAY more out of these. They cost 4 times as much as my current set and deliver half the quality. I guess they're a decent back up if I forget to charge my old earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Where's the Beef?
customer_reviews.text: Have only given them limited use. Fit was good and comfortable. Charging/battery seems fine so far. Agree with other reviewers thou, there is very little bass, depth of sound with these. They do not get very loud. I was expecting much bigger sound from JBL than this. My guess is they dialed down the bass for battery life. Anyway they are ok but I would think there are better options out there and I will try something else when I get the next chance to make a change.
customer_reviews.author: Nando5755

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I struggle to find a pair of bluetooth headphones that can make it through a workout the way I sweat - and these are exactly them! I've had 2 pairs of beats that both did not last much more than a month. I have used these almost 6 months with no issues whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schertz

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: They get really uncomfortable after 1 hour of use. Volume is either too low or too high, but the sound is good. They should have a softer material so they are more comfortable to use for a extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: 0 bass, microphone is just ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expect better sound quality, there is none bass, null if you are fine with that, then ok. volume don't turn up that much either, the microphone works, but that's it, just work (not in a positive way like clarity of sound). pd: It doesn't have to do with anything, but I bought it on the airport (which make it more expensive, like 30 dollars more) trusting JBL name, and.... well... next brand.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality sound and connection
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for four days and they will not pair with a device and they lose connection after Moving less than ten feet away from your phone. The sound quality is terrible. I received these as a present and I am terribly disappointed. I am so frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: FRANKIE UPSTON

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones... if you like disposable, use once only headphones
customer_reviews.text: It's great when it was working but like others, it stopped working after a couple of months. I take care not to get them too wet but it's inevitable with running. I assumed since it was a sports headphone it would be ok for sports. It's not. It's rubbish, won't charge and there's nothing I can do.
customer_reviews.author: Nash Hon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The pixel 2 can't even locate these headphones so it's trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the sound quality for a company like JBL - They drop the bluetooth constantly and freeze up as well
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great built quality and sound bad ears comfort
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, great built quality and lots of bass.. IF.. you force them into your ears and that's the only reason they're getting 3 stars instead of 5. just not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Fall out of ears
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother using these to work out. They just slip out non stop. I’ve cleaned them in alcohol everything they slip out of your ears. They’re worthless as are most JBL products including the dive and jump head phones.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Worst headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: Worse headphones ever. Poor sound. Poor connectivity. Random sounds and They turn on and off whenever they want to. And they stop communicating with the device. They also decide to randomly never turn off
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Blue light flashes 2 times every 5 seconds.cant turn offTempted to get a different set of earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could turn off the freaking blue light that blinks twice every 5 seconds when they're paired. Like why?
customer_reviews.author: Brian

product_meta.title: JBL Reflect Contour 2 Wireless Sport In-Ear Headphones with Three-Button Remote and Microphone (Blue)
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue

JBL Signature Sound The world renowned JBL sound that has been perfected for over 70 years tuned to provide the most epic sounding soundtrack for your active life.

10 hour battery life with speed charge Wireless Bluetooth streams audio for 10 hours to keep you rocking from a morning gym session all the way through a full day’s work. Quickly recharge the battery in 15 minutes for an hour of playback time.

Secure Fit The Dual Lock technology – a combination of patented FreebitTM enhancers and the ear hook design, ensure maximum stability and comfort for your ears during the most intense workouts.

3–Button Remote with Microphone and voice assistant With the touch of a button, easily manage your music or calls and conveniently access voice assistants.

Ergonomic Ear tips Flexible silicone ear tips and patented FreebitTM enhancers that both come in 3 different sizes allow for ultimate customization by mix and matching sizes to find the perfect fit and audio performance.

Sweatproof Ramp up the intensity of your workouts without fear. Boasting an IPX5 water–resistant rating, these headphones are built to last the most intense workouts.

Reflective Cables Designed for ultimate visibility at night.
feature_bullets: Designed for Movement. Defined by YouTake on every workout with wireless.
Three sizes of Freebit enhancers and have easy control over music and calls.
Three button remote with microphone and voice assistant.
Ergonomic Ear TipsFlexible silicone ear tips and patented Freebit enhancers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars93 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
